news.title: Nearly 200 asylum seekers listed as children and given Tusla accommodation later turned out to be adults
news.summary: Almost 200 adult asylum-seekers were placed in Tusla children’s accommodation over the last three years before it was learned they were over 18.

news.title: ‘The community is stunned’ – man (21) killed in Carlow was accidentally shot by friend as they hunted foxes, gardaí believe
news.summary: Gardaí believe a young man who died in a firearms incident in Co Carlow was accidentally shot by his friend while they were hunting foxes.

news.title: Tenants ordered to pay €19,000 arrears after landlord hiked rent from €500 to €2,000
news.summary: A couple have been ordered to pay €19,000 in arrears after their landlord hiked the monthly rent from €500 to €2,000.

news.title: World Cup 2026 draw explainer: What Heimir Hallgrimsson and Ireland will find out in US event
news.summary: A World Cup draw with Ireland in it. Well, sort of.

news.title: Ciara Kelly: The Late Late Toy Show is wildly overrated. Unlike when it began, today’s kids already have power, attention and every toy they can dream of
news.summary: The Late Late Toy Show is wildly overrated. We are, of course, all supposed to be on board with it being absolutely AMAZING, but the truth is closer to it being The Emperor’s New Toys.

news.title: Google reveals Ireland’s top searches – including ‘How to pronounce Éowyn’, Maria Steen and ‘What is 6-7?’
news.summary: Ireland’s “Year in Search” for 2025 has been revealed by Google, painting a picture of a country politically engaged, mad for sport and, above all else, obsessed with the weather.

news.title: Drugs, assault, arson and intimidation – the frightening scale of anti-social behaviour in Dublin city parks
news.summary: Dublin’s parks are plagued by drug use, drug dealing, assaults and arson attacks, with more garda patrols needed, according to council reports that paint an alarming picture of public spaces in the city.

news.title: ‘I didn’t sign up for this’: Irish parents on coping when their adult children are still living at home
news.summary: Currently, almost 70pc of 25-year-olds in Ireland are residing in the family home, mostly for financial reasons, according to research from the CSO’s  Longitudinal Growing Up in Ireland (GUI) study .

news.title: The Indo Daily: Bibles, subscriptions and €360 boxes of meat: How Ireland's anti-immigrant influencers are cashing in
news.summary: Two leading anti-immigration influencers are generating considerable personal income by selling merchandise, memberships and seeking donations to fund and grow their nationalist ideologies, according to a new report.

news.title: ‘Come here once and you won’t look back’ – sausages, ‘stress-free’ travel and the underdog spirit of Knock’s unlikely airport
news.summary: ‘Let it be easy,’ says the billboard as I pull off the N17 and drive through boggy countryside, and beneath a foggy duvet of cloud, towards Ireland West Airport.
